text: Saint Mary (, also Maryam al-Muqaddasah, Maryam Moghaddas, Maryam Adhraa Maryam Al-Muqadasa; "The Honourable/Blessed Saint Mary") is a 2000 Iranian movie directed by Shahriar Bahrani and starring Parviz Poorhosseini, Mohammad Kasebi, Hossein Yari, Shabnam Gholikhani, Mohammad Poursattar. ==Other websites== * Category:2000 movies Category:Iranian movies Category:Movies based on the Bible
title: Saint Mary (movie)
